item.title: Among Ashes coming to Xbox Series on June 6
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/among-ashes-coming-to-xbox-series-on-june-6

  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PlayStation 5 and PC.

Publisher Dojo System and developer Rat Cliff Games will release an Xbox Series version of metafictional horror game Among Ashes on June 6, the companies announced.

Among Ashes first launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on December 9, 2024. A physical PlayStation 5 release is also planned.

Here is an overview of the game, via Rat Cliff Games:

Among Ashes is a metafictional horror title about a haunted video game and the disturbing story behind its creation. It’s a stormy night in the early 2000s and your friend has sent you a link to “Night Call,” a horror game that he found online. As you play, strange things start happening in your apartment. Something is terribly wrong with the game.

Among Ashes features an innovative, meta-framing device in which players will experience a full retro-inspired first-person survival horror game within another first-person horror game, in addition to a host of unique presentational touches, surprises, mechanics and puzzles that transport players back to the turn of the millennium—providing a terrifying dose of nostalgia in the process.

In the retro-styled survival-horror “Night Call,” players will explore Stoker manor; solving puzzles and fighting off the nightmarish creatures that have infested its labyrinthian halls. In the real world, however, they’ll be haunted by the dark entities that have latched on to this strange game, as they frantically try to unravel the mystery behind the game and its enigmatic creator.

Whatever you do… KEEP PLAYING.

Watch a new trailer below.

Xbox Series Announce Trailer

item.title: Tamagotchi Plaza ‘Basic Gameplay’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/tamagotchi-plaza-basic-gameplay-trailer

  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Enjoy a carefree life with your Tamagotchi partner.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer HYDE have released a new trailer for Tamagotchi Plaza introducing the basics of gameplay.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Welcome To Wonder Shops!

A latest title of Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop series coming to Nintendo Switch! Enhance the reputation of each shop by taking orders and interacting with special Tamagotchi visitors.

With even more new Tamagotchi stopping by, you’ll have the chance to help solve their problems. Together, we can make the town vibrant and full of life!

Key Features

  • Set in Tamahiko Town on Tamagotchi Planet! – Tamahiko Town, the home of our beloved Prince Tamahiko, has been nominated to host a festival on Tamagotchi Planet! Help the town win the bid by assisting the shops and making the town livelier.
  • 12 Types of Shops Are Available! – There is the Dentist where cavities are treated, Eyewear Shop that makes perfect pair of glasses, Afternoon Tea creates table settings to suit customer’s needs, along with many other charming shops choose from. As reputation these improves, they will grow, and so variety orders.
  • Offline Two-Player Mode for Some Shops! – For the first time in the series, an offline two-player mode is now available! Collaborate or compete with each other while completing enjoyable tasks with your family and friends. (Two player mode will only be available in certain shops.)
  • Over 100 Tamagotchi in Total Appear! – The town is filled with unique Tamagotchi who enjoy their time freely. Sometimes, you may be asked to listen to their problems or help them find what they are looking for. You can also enjoy interacting with these adorable Tamagotchi!
  • Linkage Function With “Tamagotchi Uni”! – It also has a linking function with the latest toy model “Tamagotchi Uni,” which is currently on sale! You can enjoy exclusive items that can only be obtained here and special effects on both the toys and the game.

Tamagotchi Plaza is due out for Switch 2 and Switch on June 26 in Japan and June 27 worldwide.

Watch the trailer below.

Basic Gameplay Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Wuthering Waves version 2.4 update ‘Lightly We Toss the Crown’ launches June 12
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/wuthering-waves-version-2-4-update-lightly-we-toss-the-crown-launches-june-12

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

New main questlines, Echoes, Resonators, weapons, convenes, and more.

Kuro Games will release the version 2.4 update for free-to-play open-world action RPG Wuthering Waves, dubbed “Lightly We Toss the Crown,” on June 12, the developer announced.

Here is an overview of the update:

  • New Main Quest
    • Chapter II Act V – Shadow of Glory
    • Chapter II Act VI – Flames of Heart
  • Gifts of Grand Opening
    • Claim Radiant Tide x10 via in-game mail
  • New Outfits
    • Laurel Nymph
    • Changli – Deluxe Outfit
    • Splashing Summer
    • Carlotta – Deluxe Outfit
  • New Region
    • Septimont
  • New Echoes
    • Lioness of Glory
    • Nightmare: Kelpie
    • Kerasaur
    • Pilgrim’s Shell
    • Devotee’s Flesh
    • Spectro Drake
    • Fusion Drake
    • Havoc Drake
  • New Phantom Echoes
    • Phantom: Cuddle Wuddle
    • Phantom: Fae
    • Ignis
  • New Sonata Effects
    • Windward Pilgrimage
      • 2 Piece Set: Aero DMG + 10%
      • 5 Piece Set: Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.
    • Flaming Clawprint
      • 2 Piece Set: Fusion DMG +10%
      • 5 Piece Set: Casting Resonance Liberation increases Fusion DMG of Resonators in the team by 15% and the caster’s Resonance Liberation DMG by 20% lasting for 35 seconds.
  • New Echo Aspects
    • Premium Aspect: Dawn upon Thorns (Glide)
    • Premium Aspect: Dawn upon Thorns (Flight)
    • Exploration Aspect: Moment of Triumph (Flight)
    • Obtainable through Special Events
  • New Permanent Challenge Gameplay
    • Banners Never Fall
  • New Tactical Hologram Challenge
    • Tactical Hologram: Kelpie
  • Optimizations
    • In-game Guide Depot: Visit the in-game guide depot for information on how to build your Resonators and set up optimum team comps.
    • Focus Mode: Main quest focus mode will become available once Version 2.4 goes live. In focus mode, no Resonator or location will become unavailable as you progress through a quest.
    • Global Filter: Added the Global Filter feature for PC, PS5, and Mac. Select a filter that you prefer on the Global Filter page and adjust the intensity of the filter. Using the Global Filter feature allows you to adjust in-game visuals. Please note that cutscenes and UI elements will not be affected by the filter.
    • Main Quest Fast Track Event: Optimized the event “Next Stop: Rinascita.” After activating Jinzhou’s Resonance Nexus during Main Quest, you can go to Rinascita directly and start experiencing Version 2.0 content.
    • More Optimizations Coming: Stay tuned for more official announcements on updates and optimizations.
  • Lightly We Toss the Crown
    • New Resonators:
      • Cartethyia
      • Lupa
    • Upcoming Featured Resonator Convene
      • Phase I – Dance in the Storm’s Wake
      • Phase II – Roar of Triumph
    • New Weapons
      • Defier’s Thorn
      • Wildfire Mark
    • Upcoming Featured Weapon Convene
      • Phase I – Defier’s Thorn
      • Phase II – Wildfire Mark
    • Special Events:
      • The Everglorious Summit
      • Area Exploration Event
      • Septimont Travel Atlas
      • Featured Exploration Event
      • Uncovering Past Heroes
      • Photo Collection Event
      • Gifts of Applause
      • 7-Day Login Event
      • All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige
      • Echo Combat Event
      • Lollo Campaign: Verification
      • Featured Commission Event
      • Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials
      • Crisis Trial Challenge Event

Wuthering Waves is available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play. The PC version will also be available via Steam starting April 29.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Version 2.4 Official Trailer: “Lightly We Toss the Crown”

item.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time – Switch 2 ‘Graphics’ and ‘Load Time’ trailers
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/fantasy-life-i-the-girl-who-steals-time-switch-2-graphics-and-load-time-trailers

  • Switch 2

A look at how the game performs on Switch 2.

Publisher LEVEL-5 and developer LEVEL-5 Osaka Office have released two new trailers for the Switch 2 version of FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time showcasing the game’s visual and load time improvements on the platform.

As previously announced, the Switch 2 version will launch on June 5 with enhanced graphics and smoother frame rates over the Switch version. Switch users will be able to upgrade to the Switch 2 version by purchasing the “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Upgrade Pack” for $2.59 / €2.27 / 300 yen.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time is currently available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch the trailers below.

Switch 2 Graphics Showcase

Switch 2 Load Time Showcase
